title: Zephyrhills, FL | Official Website
text: The City of Zephyrhills is pleased to provide our Final FY 2026 Budget document in a new interactive digital format. This budget document is the result of a collaborative effort by the City Manager, Department Managers and members of City Council. More info... The City of Zephyrhills' 2026 Residential Sanitation Holiday Schedule is now available! For questions regarding your service, please call the Public Works Department at 813-780-0022. Saturday and Sunday are not regularly scheduled pick up days. More info... The City of Zephyrhills Public Works Department provides a "Blue Bin" Curbside Recycling Program. Curbside recycling service is offered bi-weekly, on Wednesdays. For questions, please call the Public Works Department, at 813-780-0022. More info...
